20110106070126.000|20110106070130.000|CC1|TOWN WITH THE ROBBERIES CAUGHT  
20110106070130.000|20110106070131.000|CC1|ON VIDEO.                       
20110106070131.000|20110106070133.000|CC1|>> Reporter: LOS ANGELES IS     
20110106070133.000|20110106070134.000|CC1|KNOWN AS THE FOOD TRUCK CAPITAL 
20110106070134.000|20110106070136.000|CC1|OF THE U.S., BUT THEY'RE A CASH 
20110106070136.000|20110106070139.000|CC1|BUSINESS AND OPEN LATE AND THAT 
20110106070139.000|20110106070140.000|CC1|MAKES THEM VULNERABLE.          
20110106070140.000|20110106070142.000|CC1|IN KOREA TOWN, TWO DIFFERENT    
20110106070142.000|20110106070144.000|CC1|FOOD TRUCKS WERE ROBBED BY THE  
20110106070144.000|20110106070148.000|CC1|SAME MEN AND THEY WERE CAUGHT   
20110106070148.000|20110106070149.000|CC1|ON CAMERA.                      
20110106070149.000|20110106070150.000|CC1|THE SURVEILLANCE CAMERA IS      
20110106070150.000|20110106070155.000|CC1|INSIDE THE FOOD TRUCK.          
20110106070155.000|20110106070207.000|CC1|THE VIDEO SHOWS THE LARGE       
20110106070207.000|20110106070209.000|CC1|CALIBER REVOLVER.               
20110106070209.000|20110106070211.000|CC1|HE REMOVES THE CAMERA, BUT NOT  
20110106070211.000|20110106070214.000|CC1|BEFORE HE STARES RIGHT INTO IT. 
20110106070214.000|20110106070216.000|CC1|THIS ROBBERY HAPPENED ON        
20110106070216.000|20110106070218.000|CC1|DECEMBER 29, 10:30 AT NIGHT, ON 
20110106070218.000|20110106070221.000|CC1|THE 3200 BLOCK OF EIGHTH STREET 
20110106070221.000|20110106070222.000|CC1|IN KOREA TOWN.                  
20110106070222.000|20110106070224.000|CC1|TWO THIEVES WALKED UP TO A FOOD 
20110106070224.000|20110106070225.000|CC1|TRUCK AND ROBBED TWO CUSTOMERS  
20110106070225.000|20110106070226.000|CC1|AT GUNPOINT.                    
20110106070226.000|20110106070228.000|CC1|>> WHILE ONE SUSPECT WAS        
20110106070228.000|20110106070230.000|CC1|ROBBING THE TWO PEDESTRIANS, A  
20110106070230.000|20110106070232.000|CC1|SECOND WENT INSIDE THE TRUCK    
20110106070232.000|20110106070235.000|CC1|AND ROBBED THE TRUCK EMPLOYEE   
20110106070235.000|20110106070236.000|CC1|OF HIS POSITIONS.               
20110106070236.000|20110106070238.000|CC1|>> Reporter: THE SAME TWO
